pullrequest.title: fix issue #420, make compile-time generated standalone model depend on xacro

content.raw:
Can you clarify the problem this is solving? In the issue description, you say the following:
~~~
Changing `atlas_description/urdf/*` does not trigger standalone model generator to regenerate affected models.
~~~
I tried the following, but it doesn't seem to trigger anything:
~~~
touch atlas_description/urdf/atlas_simple_shapes.urdf
~~~
If I touch one of the xacro files in `robots`, it will regenerate the standalone model.

Can you clarify what this is supposed to fix?
